message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,500. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a bit more than that.  Would you consider $13,750? I'm willing to be flexible, but this product is a steal at this price.
Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. I appreciate the offer, but I am still only able to consider $12,000 for the product. I hope we can reach a mutually agreeable price.
